title: Slice
description: Close range attack aimed at the opponent's forearms and hands, can be made with both the lead and back edges.

title: Sharpening Stone
description: {Actor.getName} keeps a well honed weapon increasing all weapon damage by {aura:sharpening_stone:damage}.

title: Setting Aside
description: Timed counter attack to deflect a thrust or parry a cut. The sword is hooked over the opponent's and forced downward and followed up with a thrust.

title: Serrated Blade
description: Successful attacks with an edged weapon cause the opponent to bleed, this effect can stack up to 5 times.

title: Pommel
description: Bash your opponent with the pommel of your sword.

title: Front Kick
description: Front kick your opponent in the chest koncking them back.

title: Overpower
description: While locked in combat, overpower your opponent.

title: Execute
description: Deliver a fatal blow to your enemy.
